Dachande:

     Just as she arrived he got the comm. He was now
very torn, revenge motivated most of his circuts, but
there was still a place for Battera.
     "I was gone," Dachande said. "I was fighting
against Magmatron in another Galaxy. But now I'm back,
by choice. He is as well. I have joined a small group
that wants to destroy him, and all his tyranny. But I
had to see you before anything. How have you been?"
